attributes.action: Reduce the Council Tax for Single people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Single working people at the moment pay one and one half of the council tax that a working couple would pay. :ie £1000 for a couple = £750 for a single working person if that person is on a low or minimum wage then it could be arounf 10% of his/her yearly income. This needs to stop NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
